00085 inline void CInteractiveTubePolylineShape::SetOrientationVisible(bool state)
00086 {
00087        if (m_isOrientationVisible != state){
00088               m_isOrientationVisible = state;
00089               Invalidate(iview::CS_CONSOLE);
00090        }
00091 }
